data.title: St Patrick’s Church
data.meta_description: St Patrick's Church is catholic church located in Brigade Road Bangalore and it is one of the oldest church in Karnataka.
data.text:
St Patrick’s Church is a popular church in Bengaluru city built in 1841, located on Brigade Road. St. Patrick’s Church was originally dedicated to Virgin Mary and Archangel Michael, marked as the “Church of the Assumption” but was popularly named as St. Patrick’s Church by the Irish troops staying near the church. St. Patrick’s Church was renovated in 2000 and 2012.

St. Patrick’s Church celebrates the annual feast of St Antony on 13th June every year.

St. Patrick’s Church Mass timings:

6:15 AM (Tamil), 7 AM, 1.15 PM and 5:30 PM (English) on Monday to Friday

6:15 AM (Tamil), 7 AM, 1.15 PM and 6 PM (English) on Saturday

6:15 AM (Kannada), 7.30 AM (Tamil), 8.45 AM, 10 AM, 11:15 AM and 6 PM (English) on Sunday

Places to visit near St.Patrick’s Church: MG Road (1 km) and Commercial Street (3 kms) are popular shopping streets near Brigade Road. Cubbon Park (1.8 kms), Lalbagh (4 kms) and Ulsoor Lake (3.6 kms) are other nearby attractions to visit.

How to reach St. Patrick’s Church:

St. Patrick’s Church is located in Brigade road, 5 kms from Majestic and 36 kms from Bengaluru international airport. MG Road Metro station is the closest metro (1.4 kms away). Brigade road has excellent bus service from all parts of Bengaluru.

Places to stay near St.Patrick’s Church: Multiple budget and luxury hotels are available in MG Road and Brigade Road.
